logs.details: Today I worked on some of the basic models for my game such as the traffic lights and the road. I also made the code for the traffic lights to work. To add to the feel of the game I made all the lights perfectly in sync with each other.

logs.details:
Today I worked on the AI for my game.
It now locks onto the player and glows red when they detect the player.
I also added the code for the ai to shoots projectiles at the player.
logs.www: I added the AI to my game and got them walking around
logs.ebi: They didnt say red when the player was not detected
